name.description: Gives the definition a short name.

kind.description: Specifies the kind of Property Definition.

format.description:
Specifies the minor version of the Property Definitions format that the definition is expressed in.
This field MUST be included in standalone definitions, i.e., when they are not embedded inside other definitions or contexts that already declares a Property Definitions format.

version.description:
The version string of the referenced standard.
The string SHOULD be in the format described by the [semantic versioning v2](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html) standard.
version.$comment: This pattern is the suggested regular expression from: https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html

resources.description: A list of dictionaries that reference remote resources that describe the unit.

relation.description: A human-readable description of the relationship between the unit and the remote resource, e.g., a "natural language description".

resource-id.description: An IRI of the external resource (which MAY be a resolvable URL).
